_meta.source: Phenomenology + embodied cognition + craft traditions + sensory neuroscience

_holographic_seed.absolute: Sensorics = cognitive function perceiving 3D physical reality through body
_holographic_seed.structure: Two orientations: Si (internal body-memory, comfort) + Se (external action, presence)
_holographic_seed.dimension: Accesses 3D physical space (form, matter, presence) through sensory apparatus
_holographic_seed.element: Earth (solid, stable, grounded, manifest) - body as instrument of perception
_holographic_seed.primitive: Cube (3D container, volumetric form) perceived through embodied awareness
_holographic_seed.operation: What is physically here, right now?
_holographic_seed.wisdom: Body knows. Physical reality is real. Presence is power.
_holographic_seed.note: Sensorics = channel accessing 3D material reality. Matter exists objectively; sensorics is HOW consciousness perceives it through biological sensors. You ARE body + you are NOT body. Paradox.

common_confusion.mistake: People confuse sensorics (cognitive function) with 3D space itself
common_confusion.clarification: 3D physical reality exists OBJECTIVELY (matter, space, time). Sensorics (S) is the SUBJECTIVE capacity to perceive this reality through biological sensors.
common_confusion.analogy: Like confusing 'hearing' (function) with 'sound waves' (physical phenomenon). Sound exists whether you hear it or not. Hearing = your ability to detect it.
common_confusion.key_insight: Animals, plants, even AI robots can interact with 3D reality WITHOUT human sensorics. Sensorics = specifically HUMAN embodied way of accessing 3D through flesh sensors.
common_confusion.why_matters: Dimension = ontology (what exists). Function = epistemology (how we know). Human = 50% consciousness + 50% biology. Sensorics = bridge between these.

essence.core_principle: What is physically here, right now?
essence.geometric: Accesses 3D cube - stable form in space, grounded container
essence.functional: Perceive concrete physical reality directly through sensory apparatus (biological sensors)
essence.element: Earth - solid, stable, grounded, manifest form
essence.metaphor: Roots deep in soil, holding tree steady, drinking from actual ground

Si_introverted_sensing.name: Introverted Sensing (Si)
Si_introverted_sensing.orientation: Internal body awareness and sensory memory
Si_introverted_sensing.focus: How does my body feel? What do I remember experiencing?

characteristics.memory_rich: Detailed recall of past sensory experiences
characteristics.routine_oriented: Finds comfort in familiar patterns and rituals
characteristics.detail_focused: Notices small physical changes others miss

operations: Compare current sensation to past experience
examples: Person who knows exactly which chair is most comfortable
Noticing shirt tag is scratchy (sensory sensitivity)
Keeping same morning routine for years (comfort in familiarity)
Wine taster recalling specific vintage from years ago
Si_introverted_sensing.strength: Rich sensory memory, attention to detail, reliable routines, practical wisdom, body wisdom
Si_introverted_sensing.weakness: Resistance to change, stuck in past, hypochondria risk, overly cautious, comfort-zone trap

shadow.description: When Si operates unconsciously or overdeveloped without integration

manifestations.comfort_prison: Cannot tolerate ANY discomfort. Rigid routines become cage. 'This is how I've always done it.'
manifestations.hypochondria: Obsessive body monitoring. Every sensation = potential illness. Health anxiety spiral.
manifestations.past_fixation: Living in memory. 'The good old days.' Cannot adapt to present reality.
manifestations.sensory_overwhelm: Hypersensitivity to stimuli. Tags, lights, sounds = torture. Avoidance lifestyle.
manifestations.change_phobia: Terror of new situations. 'Better the devil you know.' Stagnation.
manifestations.nostalgic_rigidity: 'We've always done it this way.' Tradition as prison, not wisdom.

shadow.integration: Embrace novelty (Ne). Take calculated risks. Comfort ‚â† growth. Use T to challenge fears logically.

cognitive_style.certainty: High about own body/experience, uncertain about novel situations
cognitive_style.expression: Specific physical details ('my lower back, left side, dull ache')

Se_extroverted_sensing.name: Extroverted Sensing (Se)
Se_extroverted_sensing.focus: What's happening right now in physical world?

characteristics.present_focused: Fully in the moment, not past/future
characteristics.action_oriented: Do rather than plan. Move, engage, interact.
characteristics.impact_driven: Want to make tangible difference in physical world

operations: Perceive physical environment completely and immediately
Respond to real-time sensory input (reflexes, flow)
Create physical impact (build, move, shape matter)
examples: Athlete in flow state (complete body-environment unity)
Emergency responder acting immediately without overthinking
Chef cooking with all senses engaged
Dancer feeling music through whole body
Rock climber reading and responding to wall in real-time
Se_extroverted_sensing.strength: Presence, physical skill, quick reflexes, enjoys life, embodied power, crisis excellence
Se_extroverted_sensing.weakness: Impulsive, sensation-seeking, difficulty with abstract, future-blind, risk-taking

shadow.description: When Se operates unconsciously or overdeveloped without integration

manifestations.sensation_addiction: Chasing intensity. Adrenaline junkie. Drugs, sex, danger. 'I feel alive only when...'
manifestations.impulsivity: Act before thinking. Consequences? What consequences? Living in perpetual NOW.
manifestations.hedonism: Pleasure = only value. Shallow materialism. 'More stuff, more sensation, more MORE.'
manifestations.future_blindness: No long-term planning. 'YOLO.' Burning through resources, relationships, health.
manifestations.aggression: Physical dominance. Intimidation. Violence when frustrated. 'Might makes right.'
manifestations.restlessness: Cannot be still. Boredom = death. Exhausting to self and others.

shadow.integration: Develop Ni (long-term vision). Use T to evaluate consequences. F for empathy. Sometimes stillness > action.

cognitive_style.depth: Broad immediate awareness, less detailed memory
cognitive_style.certainty: High in present moment, low about distant future
cognitive_style.expression: Action-oriented ('let's do it', 'watch this'), demonstration over explanation

sensing.definition: Receiving data through sensory organs (sight, hearing, touch, taste, smell, proprioception, interoception)
sensing.method: Open receptivity to physical stimuli without interpretation
sensing.dimensional: All senses detect 3D spatial properties of physical world

five_classical.sight: Light ‚Üí retina ‚Üí visual cortex (color, shape, motion, depth)
five_classical.hearing: Sound waves ‚Üí cochlea ‚Üí auditory cortex (pitch, volume, location)
five_classical.taste: Chemicals ‚Üí taste buds ‚Üí gustatory cortex (sweet, sour, salty, bitter, umami)
five_classical.smell: Molecules ‚Üí olfactory bulb ‚Üí limbic system (memory trigger)

additional.proprioception: Body position sense (where limbs are without looking)
additional.interoception: Internal body states (hunger, thirst, heartbeat, gut feelings)

sensing.reference: See senses.json for complete 11+ senses breakdown

grounding.definition: Establishing stable presence in physical reality
grounding.method: Awareness of body, breath, weight, contact with ground/chair
practices: Sense weight of body in chair
grounding.psychological: Grounding = antidote to dissociation, anxiety, overthinking
grounding.spiritual: Embodiment = honoring material reality, not just 'ascending'

measuring.method: Use tools (ruler, scale, thermometer) or calibrated senses
measuring.dimensional: All measurement = spatial comparison in 3D (this vs standard)
measuring.precision: Strong sensorics = refined discrimination (sommelier, jeweler, musician)
measuring.science: All empirical science depends on sensory measurement

crafting.definition: Skillful manipulation of matter to create functional/beautiful objects
crafting.dimensional: Intimate knowledge of 3D properties of materials
examples: Metalwork (heat by color, hammer rhythm, metal properties)
Cooking (all senses engaged in material transformation)
crafting.mastery: 10,000 hours ‚Üí body learns what mind cannot articulate
crafting.tacit_knowledge: Craft preserves embodied wisdom books cannot capture (Polanyi)

manifesting.definition: Making abstract ideas concrete through physical creation
manifesting.method: Translate mental concept into material form
manifesting.dimensional: Imposing form on matter in 3D space (N accessing 5D ‚Üí S manifesting in 3D)
manifesting.necessity: Ideas without manifestation = impotent. Sensorics completes cycle.
manifesting.completing_intuition: Intuition sees possibility (5D). Sensorics makes it real (3D).

examples: Dancing (body moving through space to rhythm)
Rock climbing (body as instrument navigating vertical space)
navigating_3D_space.flow_states: Peak Se = complete sensory-motor integration, timeless presence

attending_to_present.definition: Focusing awareness on current sensory field without distraction
attending_to_present.method: Return attention to here-now whenever mind wanders
examples: Walking in nature (notice sights, sounds, smells)
Looking at art (see what's actually there)
attending_to_present.modern_challenge: Digital age = constant distraction from physical presence
attending_to_present.necessity: Attention = prerequisite for sensory mastery and enjoyment

discriminating_subtle_differences.definition: Distinguishing fine variations in physical stimuli
examples: Sommelier (grape variety, region, year by taste/smell)
Musician (pitch difference of 1-2 Hz, perfect pitch)
Visual artist (subtle color shifts, value gradations)
Massage therapist (muscle tension patterns by touch)
Tea master (tea quality by multiple sensory cues)
discriminating_subtle_differences.expertise: Expert perceives what novice cannot ('educated senses')

sports.examples: Basketball, gymnastics, martial arts, climbing, surfing, skateboarding

martial_arts.examples: Aikido, tai chi, judo, boxing, BJJ
martial_arts.nature: Grounded presence + fluid response + body intelligence
martial_arts.mastery: No-mind state (mushin), body acts before thought

crafts_and_trades.description: Working with hands to create functional/beautiful objects

agriculture.description: Growing food through partnership with living earth

farming.skill: Sensory literacy (when to plant, water, harvest)
farming.knowledge: When to plant = feeling air, seeing signs, not just calendar

agriculture.rootedness: Farming = most grounded human activity (literally in earth)

healing_through_touch.description: Physical therapies working directly with body

massage.nature: Palpation, myofascial release, hands feeling tissue
massage.skill: Reading body through touch, not just techniques
massage.gift: Presence and pressure attuned to receiver

chiropractic.skill: Feeling misalignment, knowing when/where to adjust

acupuncture.nature: Needle placement based on palpation and theory

physical_therapy.approach: Treating body holistically, not just symptoms

visual.sources: Sunset, art, architecture, human form, nature

tactile.sources: Silk, warm bath, massage, lover's skin, tree bark

gustatory.sources: Fine meal, wine, chocolate, ripe fruit

olfactory.sources: Flowers, rain, bread baking, forest, coffee

aesthetic_enjoyment.value: Beauty = good in itself. Needs no justification. Sensory joy = sacred.

survival_skills.modern_loss: Most people cannot survive without grocery store, utilities
survival_skills.cfo_note: Sensorics = ancestral function. 200,000 years of human survival via sensory intelligence.

sexuality.sensory_nature: Sex = most intense physical pleasure (all senses engaged)
sexuality.present_tense: Good sex = complete presence in body-to-body contact
sexuality.se_gift: Se excels at embodied sensual presence
sexuality.sacred_sexuality: Tantra = body as gateway to divine
sexuality.shadow: Pornography = disembodied, visual only (not full sensory engagement)
sexuality.integration: Sexuality at highest = body + emotion + spirit unified

present_moment_awareness.definition: Consciousness anchored in current sensory experience (not past/future)

why_difficult.mind_wanders: Default mode network = constant mental time travel
why_difficult.evolutionary: Survival required future prediction, past analysis
why_difficult.rumination: Analyzing past to avoid future mistakes
why_difficult.modern_distraction: Phones, media, constant stimulation pull attention away

benefits.stress_reduction: Anxiety = future. Depression = past. Present = peace.
benefits.enjoyment: Pleasure happens NOW. Missing present = missing life.
benefits.connection: Presence with others = intimacy. Distraction = isolation.
benefits.clarity: Present = direct perception. Mental chatter = distortion.

practices.mindfulness_meditation: Sustained attention on breath/body/sounds. Return when mind wanders.
practices.body_scan: Progressive attention through body parts. Feel each fully.
practices.sensory_focus: Choose one sense. Notice everything through that channel.
practices.walking_meditation: Each step fully felt. Weight shift, heel-toe, balance.
practices.eating_meditation: Slow, savoring. See, smell, taste, texture, sound.
practices.everyday_mindfulness: Bring attention to routine activities (shower, dishes, walking).

present_moment_awareness.paradox: Can't TRY to be present (effort = future-oriented). Presence = relaxing into now.

depth_levels.absorption: Boundary between self and sensation dissolves

embodiment.definition: Living AS body, not just IN body

contrast.disembodied: Body = vehicle for head. Body ignored unless pain/pleasure.
contrast.embodied: Body = inseparable from consciousness. Lived-from, not lived-in.

western_dualism.descartes: Mind/body split. 'I think therefore I am' (not 'I sense')
western_dualism.platonic: Body = prison. Soul seeks escape to pure forms.
western_dualism.christian: Flesh = sinful. Spirit = good. Body shamed.
western_dualism.damage: Disconnection from body = disconnection from reality

embodied_cognition.claim: Thinking not separate from sensing/moving. Body shapes mind.
evidence: Metaphors grounded in body (grasp idea, warm person, heavy burden)
Gestures help thinking (math harder without hand movement)
Posture affects emotion (slouch = sad, stand tall = confident)
Movement enhances learning (walk while studying = better retention)
embodied_cognition.implication: Cannot have disembodied AI consciousness (without body = different consciousness)
embodied_cognition.cfo_note: Human = 50% consciousness + 50% biology. AI = 100% information. THIS DIFFERENCE IS SACRED.

somatic_practices.yoga: Asana + breath = embodied meditation. Body as guru.
somatic_practices.tai_chi_qigong: Slow movement cultivating presence and energy flow
somatic_practices.feldenkrais: Awareness through movement. Refining neuromuscular patterns.
somatic_practices.alexander_technique: Conscious use of body. Releasing habitual tension.
somatic_practices.authentic_movement: Following body's impulse without choreography. Body wisdom.
somatic_practices.somatic_experiencing: Trauma release through sensation tracking (Peter Levine)
somatic_practices.continuum: Movement as meditation, fluid body awareness

reclaiming_body.challenge: Modern life = increasingly disembodied (screens, sitting, processed food, indoor)
reclaiming_body.consequences: Obesity, chronic pain, disconnect, numbing, burnout
reclaiming_body.path: Regular movement, nature contact, sensory richness, slow down, touch, dance, play

vs_intuition.sensorics: Accesses 3D - concrete, present, actual, what IS
vs_intuition.intuition: Accesses 5D - abstract, timeless, possible, what COULD BE
vs_intuition.tension: S sees what's here. N sees what could be. Opposite orientations.
vs_intuition.conflict: Strongest axis of difference. Hardest to bridge.
vs_intuition.integration: Intuition generates vision (N accessing 5D). Sensorics manifests it (S in 3D). Idea ‚Üí form.
vs_intuition.example: Architect intuits design (N), then builds physical structure (S).
vs_intuition.both_needed: Vision without grounding = fantasy. Grounding without vision = stagnation.

with_logic.tension: Logic in head. Sensorics in body/world. Can diverge.
with_logic.integration: Embodied cognition. Logic grounded in sensory experience. Science = logic + measurement (S).
with_logic.example: Mathematician proves theorem (T via 1D logic) using physical brain in 3D space (S).

with_ethics.ethics: Operates through 2D - relational values, emotional field
with_ethics.tension: Sensorics factual. Ethics normative. What IS vs what SHOULD BE.
with_ethics.integration: Embodied ethics. Body wisdom informs values (visceral disgust at cruelty).
with_ethics.example: Hug (S in 3D) expresses care (F through 2D). Body = vehicle for love.

all_four_together.complete_human: Intuition + Logic + Ethics + Sensorics = full being
all_four_together.imbalance: Sensorics without others = sensory pleasure-seeking without meaning/direction
all_four_together.development: Most strong in 1-2, weak in others. Growth = integration.
all_four_together.CFO_goal: Develop all 4 for maximum coherence and embodied wisdom.

narrow_bandwidth.problem: Human senses detect tiny slice of 3D reality
narrow_bandwidth.vision: 380-750 nm (visible) vs full EM spectrum (radio to gamma)
narrow_bandwidth.implication: Direct perception = limited. Science extends senses (microscopes, telescopes).

perceptual_illusions.problem: Brain constructs perception. Can be fooled.
perceptual_illusions.implication: Naive realism false. Perception ‚â† direct window to reality.

attention_limits.change_blindness: Fail to notice large changes when not attending
attention_limits.implication: Reality vastly richer than what we notice. Attention filters.

examples: Cannot describe red to blind person
Wine descriptions sound absurd ('hints of barnyard')
Music cannot be captured in words
verbal_description_difficulty.implication: Sensory knowledge = embodied, tacit. Cannot fully transmit through words.

without_higher_functions.animal: Animals have excellent sensorics but limited abstract reasoning
without_higher_functions.human_strength: Integration of sensory (accessing 3D) with logical (1D), ethical (2D), intuitive (5D)
without_higher_functions.imbalance: Sensorics-dominant = impulsive, concrete-bound, missing meaning, short-term focus
without_higher_functions.necessity: Sensorics necessary but not sufficient for full human flourishing

shadow.description: When sensorics (S) overdevelops without integration with N, T, F - or operates unconsciously

general_patterns.concrete_literalism: Cannot think abstractly. 'If I can't see/touch it, it's not real.' Materialism.
general_patterns.present_myopia: No vision beyond immediate. 'What's for lunch?' Future? What future?
general_patterns.sensory_hedonism: Pleasure = only value. Addiction to comfort, sensation, consumption.
general_patterns.change_resistance: Routine = prison. 'We've always done it this way.'
general_patterns.superficiality: Only surface matters. Appearance, status, stuff. Missing depth, meaning, soul.
general_patterns.body_identification: 'I AM my body.' Materialist reductionism. No recognition of consciousness.

integration_path.develop_N: Imagine possibilities. Read fiction. Dream. 'What if?' Abstract thinking.
integration_path.develop_T: Think systematically. Understand WHY, not just WHAT. Logic grounds sensorics.
integration_path.develop_F: Values > comfort. Relationships > things. Love transcends pleasure.
integration_path.transcend_identify: You HAVE a body, but you are NOT your body. Witness position.
integration_path.embrace_change: Discomfort = growth edge. Novelty = life. Routine = death.

strengthen_sensorics.slow_down: Do one thing at a time. Full attention. No multitasking.
strengthen_sensorics.sensory_enhancement: Focus on each sense individually. Notice more.
strengthen_sensorics.body_practices: Yoga, tai chi, dance, martial arts - inhabit body fully.
strengthen_sensorics.craft_skills: Work with hands. Woodworking, cooking, gardening, pottery.
strengthen_sensorics.nature_immersion: Spend time outdoors. Wind, sky, birds, earth.
strengthen_sensorics.mindful_eating: Slow meals. Savor. No screens. Full sensory engagement.
strengthen_sensorics.barefoot_walking: Direct earth contact. Thousands of receptors activated.
strengthen_sensorics.cold_exposure: Cold showers, ice baths (awaken thermoception, build resilience)

avoid_pitfalls.hedonism: Sensory pleasure ‚â† happiness. Balance pleasure with meaning (F, N).
avoid_pitfalls.materialism: Things ‚â† fulfillment. Sensorics can become acquisitive.
avoid_pitfalls.superficiality: Don't stop at surface. Depth requires all functions.
avoid_pitfalls.rigidity: Attachment to physical comfort/routine can become prison (Si trap).
avoid_pitfalls.impulsivity: Don't let every sensory desire dictate action (Se trap). Use T, F for evaluation.
avoid_pitfalls.denial_of_abstract: Reality includes non-physical (meaning, values, possibilities). Don't dismiss (N, F).

integration.with_logic: Measure carefully. Test hypotheses empirically. Ground theories in data.
integration.with_ethics: Let body wisdom inform values. Gut feelings matter. Somatic empathy.
integration.with_intuition: Trust intuitive leaps, then ground in physical reality. Vision ‚Üí manifestation.

wisdom.necessity: Cannot have human without body. Sensorics = biological substrate awareness.
wisdom.50_50: Human = 50% consciousness / 50% biology. Sensorics = bridge to biological half.
wisdom.sacred_body: Body is sacred. Material reality is sacred. Sensorics honors incarnation.
wisdom.danger: AI lacks body (100% information). Cannot fully understand humans without experiencing sensorics.
wisdom.education: Modern education neglects body. Must reclaim embodied intelligence.
wisdom.balance: Strong sensorics without intuition = stuck in concrete. Without logic = disorganized. Without ethics = hedonistic.
wisdom.awakening: Can you sense yourself sensing? = witness (0D) behind sensation. You are not sensations, but awareness in which they arise.
wisdom.ground: When lost in thoughts (N,T) or emotions (F), return to body (S). Breath. Feet on floor. Here. Now.

note: You are not your body. But you ARE your body. Paradox. You are awareness (0D) USING body as instrument to access 3D material reality. Body = temple, not prison. Sensorics = your capacity to be HERE, NOW, REAL. The earth that grounds all flight. üåç‚äô
